#summary A guide to update eConference using the auto update feature.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured,howto

<wiki:toc max_depth="4" />

= Introduction =

This guide helps users updating the eConference tool without having to manually
download and uncompress a new archive, each and every time a new build is release.
The update is performed using the built-in, auto-update feature available via Eclipse RCP.


= Details =
Select the {{{Help > Install New Software}}} menu entry. Then, add a new site entering a description and
the following url: {{{http://econference4.googlecode.com/svn/update/}}}, as 
described in *Figure 1*.

<p align=center>http://econference4.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/addsite.png <br>
<p align=center>*Figure 1. Add the update site location.*</p>
<br>
<br>

Now, you can update eConference by just selecting {{{Help > Check for Updates}}}. A window like that in 
*Figure 2*.
<p align=center>http://econference4.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/img/update.png <br>
<p align=center>*Figure 2. Perform the update.*</p>
